agent.name: GOSR.ai Civic Program Agent
agent.description: AI agent that understands and can interact with civic programs using the human-aligned A2A extension

extensions.description: Understands ProgramCards with operating_character, participation_templates, and GOSR integration. Can assess alignment, recommend participation pathways, and reason about civic program ecosystems.
supported_features: operating_character interpretation (Spiral Dynamics, Hofstede, Insights Discovery)
alignment assessment between programs and goals
participation pathway matching based on user context

use_cases.title: Program Discovery
use_cases.description: Help users find civic programs that match their values, communication style, and desired level of engagement

use_cases.title: Alignment Assessment
use_cases.description: Analyze compatibility between programs and user/organizational operating character for better collaboration fit

use_cases.title: Participation Guidance
use_cases.description: Recommend specific participation pathways based on user skills, availability, and goals

use_cases.title: GOSR Mapping
use_cases.description: Position programs within Goal-Obstacle-Solution-Resource frameworks to identify gaps and opportunities
